00002 
00003 const std::string&
00004 dds::retcode2string(::DDS::ReturnCode_t rc) 
00005 {
00006   static const short RETCODES_N = 13;
00007   static std::string retcodeStrings[RETCODES_N] = {
00008     "DDS_RETCODE_OK",
00009     "DDS_RETCODE_ERROR",
00010     "DDS_RETCODE_UNSUPPORTED",
00011     "DDS_RETCODE_BAD_PARAMETER",
00012     "DDS_RETCODE_PRECONDITION_NOT_MET",
00013     "DDS_RETCODE_OUT_OF_RESOURCES",
00014     "DDS_RETCODE_NOT_ENABLED",
00015     "DDS_RETCODE_IMMUTABLE_POLICY",
00016     "DDS_RETCODE_INCONSISTENT_POLICY",
00017     "DDS_RETCODE_ALREADY_DELETED",
00018     "DDS_RETCODE_TIMEOUT",
00019     "DDS_RETCODE_NO_DATA",
00020     "DDS_RETCODE_ILLEGAL_OPERATION"
00021   };
00022   
00023   ::dds::Assert::precondition(rc < RETCODES_N , "Bad ReturnCode_t");
00024   return retcodeStrings[rc];
00025 }
